title: Arrests Made Following Car Explosion Outside U.K. Hospital
sub_head: Three men detained following blast that killed one man, injured another in Liverpool
body:
British police arrested three men under terrorism laws Sunday after a car exploded outside a hospital in Liverpool, killing one man and injuring another.
Counterterrorism police said the three men, whose ages range from 21 to 29, were detained in the Kensington area of the northwest England city under the Terrorism Act.
